Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the resource name. For example:

{ "Ref": "myInstance1" }

For the AWS OpsWorks instance myInstance1, Ref returns the AWS OpsWorks instance ID.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Availability Zone of the AWS OpsWorks instance, such as us-east-2a.
The private DNS name of the AWS OpsWorks instance.
The private IP address of the AWS OpsWorks instance, such as 192.0.2.0.
The public DNS name of the AWS OpsWorks instance.
The public IP address of the AWS OpsWorks instance, such as  192.0.2.0. NoteUse this attribute only when the AWS OpsWorks instance is in an AWS OpsWorks layer  that auto-assigns public IP addresses.
